org.gearman

Interface GearmanPersistence


  • public interface GearmanPersistence
    An application hook telling the framework how jobs will persist.
    Author:
    isaiah

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void delete(GearmanPersistable item)
      Removes the GearmanPersistable item from the persistent medium.

      When this method returns, it is guaranteed the delete operation has completed.
      void deleteAll()
      Removes all items from the persistent medium.

      When this method returns, it is guaranteed all delete operations have completed.
      java.util.Collection<GearmanPersistable> readAll()
      Reads all persistable items from the persistent medium.
      void write(GearmanPersistable item)
      Write the GearmanPersistable item to a persistent medium.

      When this method returns, it is guaranteed the write operation has completed.

    • Method Detail

      • write

        void write(GearmanPersistable item)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Write the GearmanPersistable item to a persistent medium.

        When this method returns, it is guaranteed the write operation has completed.
        Parameters:
        item - The item to write to a persistent medium
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If an exception occurs while writing the item

      • delete

        void delete(GearmanPersistable item)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Removes the GearmanPersistable item from the persistent medium.

        When this method returns, it is guaranteed the delete operation has completed.
        Parameters:
        item - The item to remove
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If an exception occurs while removing the item

      • deleteAll

        void deleteAll()
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Removes all items from the persistent medium.

        When this method returns, it is guaranteed all delete operations have completed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If an exception occurs while removing the items

      • readAll

        java.util.Collection<GearmanPersistable> readAll()
                                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Reads all persistable items from the persistent medium.
        Returns:
        A collection GearmanPersistable
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If an exception occurs while removing the items
